---
title: AI Chatbot
publishDate: 2025-01-21T00:00:00Z
img: /assets/ai-chatbot.png
img_alt: AI Chatbot interface showcasing an interactive chat and bot responses
description: |
  Developed an AI-powered chatbot using Vaadin, Spring Boot, and Hugging Face API to deliver a seamless conversational experience. This project demonstrates expertise in integrating backend services with AI APIs, crafting a responsive UI using Vaadin, and Dockerizing the application for deployment scalability. It highlights a user-focused approach to chatbot design, catering to educational and customer support use cases.

tags:
  - Backend Development
  - AI Integration
  - Web Application
  - Docker
